login.NAME: login
login.DESCRIPTION: Log in with your Riot acoount
login.FAILED: Failed to log in please try again

logout.NAME: logout
logout.DESCRIPTION: Logout and Delete your account from database
logout.FAILED: Failed to logout, please try again!

store.NAME: store
store.DESCRIPTION: Shows your daily store in your accounts

point.NAME: point
point.DESCRIPTION: View your remaining Valorant and Radiant Points (VP/RP)

nightmarket.NAME: nightmarket
nightmarket.DESCRIPTION: Show skin offers on the nightmarket

notify_add.NAME: add
notify_add.DESCRIPTION: Set a notification when a specific skin is available on your store

DESCRIBE.skin: The name of the skin you want to notify

notify_add.SUCCESS: Successfully set an notify for the {emoji} **{skin}**
notify_add.SKIN_ALREADY_IN_LIST: {emoji} **{skin}** is already added to your notification list

notify_list.NAME: list
notify_list.DESCRIPTION: View skins you have set a for notification.
notify_list.TITLE: Your Notify List
notify_list.REMOVE_NOTIFY: Click button for remove from notify

notify_mode.NAME: mode

DESCRIBE.mode: The mode you want to change to

notify_mode.SUCCESS: Successfully changed your notification mode to **{mode}**

notify_test.NAME: test
notify_test.NOTIFY_TURN_OFF: You're not turn on notification mode
notify_test.BOT_MISSING_PERM:
**I don't have permission to send notifications in this channel!** 
please check permission the bot can `View channel`, `Send messages`, `Embed links` and `Use external emoji`. in this channel, then try `/notify test`.
notify_test.FAILED_SEND_NOTIFY: Failed to send notification, please try again
notify_test.PLEASE_ALLOW_DM_MESSAGE: Please allow DM message in your privacy settings

notify_send.RESPONSE_SPECIFIED:
{emoji} **{name}** is in your daily store!
Remaining {duration}

DESCRIBE.channel: Select the channel you want to change.

DESCRIBE.bundle: The name of the bundle you want to inspect!

debug.NAME: debug
debug.DESCRIPTION: The command debug for the bot

DESCRIBE.bug: The bug you want to fix.

cookies.NAME: cookies
cookies.DESCRIPTION: Login to your account with a cookie

AUTH.INVALID_PASSWORD: Your username or password may be incorrect!
AUTH.RATELIMIT: Please wait a few minutes and try again.
AUTH.NO_NAME_TAG: This user hasn't created a name or tagline yet.
AUTH.REGION_NOT_FOUND: An unknown error occurred, please `/login` again

DATABASE.NOT_LOGIN: you're not registered!, please `/login` to register!
DATABASE.LOGIN_ERROR: Fail to login, please try again!
DATABASE.LOGOUT_ERROR: I can't logout you if you're not registered!
DATABASE.LOGOUT_EXCEPT: An error occurred while logging out.

SETUP_EMOJI.MISSING_PERM: I doesn't have permission to create emoji !
SETUP_EMOJI.FAILED_CREATE_EMOJI: I Can't create emoji please try again
